input.sentences: [male] and [male] met for their weekly bike ride in the neighborhood .
[male] was there | ready to ride with the others .
[male] was also there | joking around and ready to ride .
[male] showed off some of his bike skills at the end of the ride .
after the ride | the boys and their girlfriends gathered round for a few drinks and a chat .
output.sentences: I decided to take pictures of people who ride bikes through my neighborhood.
Most of the riders wore helmets.
A lot of the riders were men.
This man was doing tricks on his bike.
We also saw people walking and waiting for the riders.
